features.label: View Profile
features.description: Allows users to view their personal profile information.

features.label: Edit Profile
features.description: Enables users to update their profile details.

features.label: Profile Picture
features.description: Functionality related to profile picture management.

features.label: Upload Picture
features.description: Allows users to upload a new profile picture.

features.label: Remove Picture
features.description: Enables users to remove their current profile picture.

features.label: Browse Content
features.description: Allows users to explore available content.

features.label: Search Content
features.description: Enables users to search for specific content.

features.label: Content Categories
features.description: Allows users to browse content by categories

features.label: Explore Category
features.description: Allows users to explore the contents of a category.
